text: When using remarketing, some personal data to identify the user, such as name, email and/or phone number, may be transferred to the provider of the advertising or a social media network (such as Facebook).

In some cases, our third-party product providers will be acting as data processors of your information and, therefore, we advise you to read their Privacy Policy and sign a Data Processing Agreement.
These third-party product providers will share your information with us, which we will use in accordance with this Privacy Statement.

Why do we collect and use personal data?

We may use your information for the following purposes:
If you are a representative for your company, we process your personal contact information with regard to the company.

SuperOffice uses remarketing tracking cookies and conversion pixels from Google, LinkedIn and Facebook, in order to present you with special offers for our products or services over the Google Content Network and via social networks.

data_type: datum you provide during application process
text: If you apply for a job at SuperOffice, we collect the data you provide during the application process.
We collect name, phone number, title and email address, in addition to your company's name and contact information.
We may also collect feedback, comments and questions received from you in service-related communication and activities, such as meetings, phone calls, documents, and emails.
From our websites we may collect IP-address and actions taken on the site.
